text: Aaron Wiggins is a basketball player for the Oklahoma City Thunder. Wiggins was chosen by the Oklahoma City Thunder with the 55th pick in the second round of the 2021 NBA Draft. With an average of 11.2 points per game, Wiggins had an extremely successful NBA Summer League season with the Thunder. He committed to the Thunder on a two-way contract on August 15, 2021. As per the agreement, he alternated between the Thunder and the Oklahoma City Blue, their NBA G League club. Against the New Orleans Pelicans on December 26, 2021, Wiggins scored a career-high 24 points. He made 8 of 10 field goals and 2 of 4 three- pointers in Thunder's 117â€“112 victory. Wiggins' two-way contract was changed to a regular NBA contract by the Thunder on February 12, 2022. title: Aaron Wiggins
